comment: Congrats to Zooey Deschanel and Jacob Pechenik in bringing in another child to the planet that is overpopulated.
amr:
# ::snt Congrats to Zooey Deschanel and Jacob Pechenik in bringing in another child to the planet that is overpopulated.
(c / congratulate-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Zooey"
                        :op2 "Deschanel"))
            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Jacob"
                        :op2 "Pechenik")))
      :ARG2 (b / bring-01
            :ARG0 a
            :ARG1 (c2 / child
                  :mod (a2 / another))
            :ARG2 (p3 / planet
                  :ARG1-of (p4 / populate-01
                        :degree (o / over)))))
